metadata.title: USN-4863-1 -- fstream vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that fstream incorrectly handled certain crafted tarballs. An attacker could use this vulnerability to write arbitrary files to the filesystem.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4863-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-fstream - 0.1.24-1ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
